mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wade, Benjamin F. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wade, Benjamin F.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 7th 1861. By Telegraph, from Washington, 7th 1861. Your senators shall be admitted to their seats whenever they appear whether the old ones are vacated or not but I intend to have them vacated tomorrow. BF Wade 27W69&155col chq [page 2] B.F. Wade July 7th
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wade, Benjamin F.
Washington, DC
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
